transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello

Hello
Executive: Ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji ji main Rakesh Kumar Pathi baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Rakesh Kumar main India Mart se baat kar raha hun aapne call kiya tha abhi kuch issue aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Haan issue mujhe ye aa raha hai ki main isme itna gmail verify nahi kar pa raha hun aur gmail pe koi OTP nahi aa rahi verify kaise hota hai.
Executive: Gmail pe OTP nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Jo gmail yahan par hamare paas hai wo aap hi use kar rahe hain usko?
Customer: Kaun sa hai aapke paas?
Executive: Main bata deta hun.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Wo gmail jo gmail wahi verify karna hai na jo hamare paas registered hai?
Customer: Haan hai na helloacnp.
Executive: Haan helloacnp hai @gmail.com to ye kya change karna hai isko verify karna hai kya karna hai aapko?
Customer: Isko verify karna hai ye actually main desktop use kar raha hun.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To desktop mein ye issue aa raha hai ki hamare paas bhaiya ne jo hai do number add kiye hue hain aur do gmail add kiya hai to do number aur ek gmail to verify ho gaya hai but ek jo ye helloacnp@gmail.com hai ye verify nahi ho pa raha hai jo ki hamare farm ka ye gmail mail hai mail ID hai.
Executive: Main ek aapko kaam kariye main aapko kara deta hun isko google meet pe join ho jaaiye to main screen dekh ke na acche se aapko guide kar paunga maine google meet ka link diya hai aapko isi email ID par helloacnp par.
Customer: Accha check kariye ek baar aaya kya aapke paas?
Executive: Just a minute.
Customer: Haan Priom India Mart karke aaya hai.
Executive: Priom India Mart se aaya hoga mere naam hai wahan par join now ka option aa raha hoga wahan se join kar lijiye aap.
Customer: Join Google Meet
Executive: Ek second rukiyega.



Executive: Ye verify wahan unverify likh kar aa raha hai aapke usme?
Customer: Kya likh ke aa raha hai?
Executive: Unverify likh kar aa raha hai isliye verify karna hai matlab ya isko aapko kaise pata chala ki isko unverify verify karna hai?
Customer: Actually ye hai na desktop pe ye issue aa raha hai.
Executive: Ek minute second.
Executive: Desktop pe kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Desktop pe aa raha hai verify verify karna hai verify pe jaise hi main click karunga.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap dekhenge ki ispe ye enter four digit OTP to verify email ID hai.
Executive: Theek hai kariye join kariye aap ek baar.
Customer: Ji ji main kar raha hun.



Executive: Theek hai ek baar screen share kar dijiye dekhiye isme aapke isme aawaz aati hai desktop se baat ho rahi hai directly?
Customer: Desktop se directly baat nahi yahan call pe baat ho pa rahi hai.
Executive: Accha ye theek hai aap ek baar screen share kariye ek baar.
Customer: Ek second rukiye.
Executive: Ye hai na aap dekh rahe hain na?
Customer: Haan mere ko dikh raha hai aap screen share karoge na to phir mere ko laptop ki screen dikhne lagegi.

Executive: Bata du main kahan se hoti hai?
Customer: Haan kar dijiye.
Executive: Hua nahi hai abhi.

Executive: Abhi ho gaya.
Executive: Haan theek hai.
Executive: Ek second.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to verify Gmail, OTP not received.

- Wants to verify Gmail on desktop.



Resolution:

- Executive sent Google Meet link to guide.

- Executive asked to share screen to assist.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive is guiding the customer on call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- gmail verification, otp, desktop issue, google meet
